SELECT menu_id,menu_seq FROM ( SELECT 'MENU' || TRIM( TO_CHAR( SUBSTR( NVL( MAX(MENU_ID), 'MENU00'), 5, 2 ) +1, '00') ) AS MENU_ID FROM MENUS) menu_id, (SELECT NVL( MAX(MENU_SEQ), 0 ) + 1 as menu_seq FROM MENUS) menu_seq
